preface.title: What's LIXA
preface.para: LIXA is acronym of LIbre XA: it's a free, libre, open source implementation of two X/Open standards: "Distributed Transaction Processing: The TX (Transaction Demarcation) Specification" and "Distributed Transaction Processing: The XA Specification"
LIXA implements an XA compliant transaction manager. LIXA supplies the TX API.

These are useful links to reach the official X/Open documentation:
Distributed Transaction Processing: Reference Model, Version 3
Distributed TP: The TX (Transaction Demarcation) Specification
Distributed TP: The XA Specification
LIXA documentation tries to avoid duplication with the content of the above books.
